data.title: Ben Gordon news and rumors
data.text:
NBA market

Warriors waive veteran guard Ben Gordon

The Golden State Warriors have waived guard Ben Gordon, the team announced today. The Warriors’ training camp roster currently stands at 18 players.

NBA market

Warriors sign Ben Gordon

The Golden State Warriors have signed free agent guard Ben Gordon to a contract, the team announced today. Per team policy, terms of the deal were not released.

NBA market

Warriors add Ben Gordon to training camp roster

Former NBA sixth man award winner Ben Gordon is finalizing a contract to join the Golden State Warriors for training camp, according to league sources.

NBA market

Ben Gordon has team option declined by Magic

The Orlando Magic are declining the $4.5 million team option for 2015-'16 on guard Ben Gordon’s contract, according to league sources.

NBA market

Ben Gordon to join Magic for 2 years, $9 million

Free-agent guard Ben Gordon has reached agreement on a two-year, $9 million contract with the Orlando Magic.

NBA market

Bobcats request waivers on Ben Gordon

Charlotte Bobcats President of Basketball Operations Rod Higgins announced today that the team has requested waivers on guard Ben Gordon.

NBA rumors

Bobcats reportedly close to buying out Ben Gordon

The Charlotte Bobcats and Ben Gordon are closing in on a buyout agreement that will make the veteran guard a free agent.

NBA rumors

Bobcats are shopping Ben Gordon again

The Charlotte Bobcats are shopping Ben Gordon, according to league sources. They have talked to many teams about the veteran guard.
